com.drgarbage.controlflowgraph.intf

Interface INodeExt

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBasicBlock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicBlock, NodeExt

    public interface INodeExt
    Vertex properties for graph algorithms.
    Version:
    $Revision: 187 $ $Id: INodeExt.java 187 2013-06-03 05:47:37Z salekseev $
    Author:
    Sergej Alekseev
